Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Kiss me, child.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens. We're very sorry for your losses.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Gallant, yes. And charming and very clean. He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick. That does not make him wise. As to your fathead father-

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: She might think we have some wits about us. One of us, at any rate. It was treason. I warned them. Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother. How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair? We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me. But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders. So here we are to see things through. What do you say to that, Sansa? Shall we have some lemon cakes?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So we've been told. Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death? Here, Sansa, come sit with me. I'm much less boring than these others.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do you know my son? The Lord of Highgarden?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No great pleasure, believe me. A ponderous oaf. His father was an oaf as well. My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking. They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him. And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse. Now I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You, you. Who else would know better? We've heard some troubling tales. Is there any truth to them? Has this boy mistreated you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Has he ripped out your tongue?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes, all Lannisters are lions. And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose. But how kind is he? How clever? Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Bring me some cheese.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The cheese will be served when I want it served. And I want it served now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Are you frightened, child? No need for that. We're only women here. Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes, he had that reputation. And they named him traitor and took his head.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Go on.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Speak freely, child. We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Ah. That's a pity.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden is determined that Margaery shall be queen. Even so, we thank you for the truth. Ah, here comes my cheese.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No need to speak. Are there any figs? Fetch some. I always take figs midafternoon. They help move the bowels. To what do I owe this summons?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Naturally.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Good.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I can't think how it slipped my mind. What is it, twelve thousand infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied? Two thousand in support. Provisions so this city might survive the winter. A million bushels of wheat. Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye. Twenty thousand head of cattle. Fifty thousand sheep. You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses. I'm quite familiar with them.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: As is a royal wedding. The people are hungry for more than just food. They crave distractions. And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own. And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces. A royal wedding is much safer. Wouldn't you say?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And traditionally paid for by the royal family.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper. Where did you go for them, Volantis?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh, very well. I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part. We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned. Is that sufficient?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Impossible.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: My grandson is the pride of Highgarden. The most desirable bachelor in all seven kingdoms. Your daughter-

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Old.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Old. I'm something of an expert on the subject. Her change will be upon her before long. I'll spare you the details of what will happen then. You men may have a stomach for bloodshed and slaughter, but this is another matter entirely.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh, not at all. A sword swallower through and through.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Did you grow up with boy cousins, Lord Tywin? Sons of your father's bannermen, squires, stable boys?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And you never-

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Not once? Not in any way?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I congratulate you upon your restraint. But it's a natural thing, two boys having a go at each other beneath the sheets.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I wouldn't say that. True, we don't tie ourselves in knots over a discreet bit of buggery, but brothers and sisters- where I come from, that stain would be very difficult to wash out.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Lie or not, you must admit many people find it quite convincing. Convincing enough to put swords in their hands and send them off to kill Lannisters and Tyrells thanks to our new affiliation.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: As an authority on myself, I must disagree.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And if Cersei is too old to give Loras children, we're throwing another prized flower into the dirt. It is a chance we simply cannot take.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You would have your grandson protected by someone who disgusts you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It's a rare enough thing- a man who lives up to his reputation.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So their son will be your nephew. After you're wed to Cersei, of course. And you will be the king's stepfather and brother-in-law. When you marry the king, Joffrey's mother will become his sister-in-law and your son will be Loras' nephew? Grandson? I'm not sure. But your brother will become your father-in-law. That much is beyond dispute.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No. No. You're a queen, not an ox.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Your grandfather gave me a necklace just like this one for my 51st nameday.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Nonsense.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: My little dears. Go and speak to the jewelers of King's Landing. Tell them who you are, tell them who sent you. The one who brings me the best necklace will get to keep the next best.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The Margaery Tyrell who walks into the sept a fortnight from now will inspire 1,000 songs. Now, how sad it will be if she's wearing rubbish like that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You watch that. Even here, even with me.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: My word.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: We know who you are. We've heard all about you. But hearing is one thing. Aren't you just marvelous? Absolutely singular.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I hear you knocked my grandson into the dirt like the silly little boy he is.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You dare not refuse.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It feels proportionate.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The expected extravagance.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You ought to try enjoying something before you die. You might find it suits you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Not now, Mace. Lord Tywin and I are speaking.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Anyway, I don't know what you're complaining about. I'm paying my share.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No, your heartfelt thank you is its own reward. I would imagine I'd be hearing it again before long. Wars are rather expensive. "The Iron Bank will have it's due." How they love to remind everyone. Almost as much as you Lannisters with your debts.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: We both know you're smarter than that. Come, Tywin, let us celebrate young love.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You look exquisite, child. The wind has been at you, though. I haven't had the opportunity to tell you how sorry I was to hear about your brother. War is war, but killing a man at a wedding, horrid. What sort of monster would do such a thing? As if men need more reasons to fear marriage.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Lord Tyrion, you see? Not as bad as all that. Perhaps if your pauper husband were to sell his mule and his last pair of shoes, he might be able to afford to bring you to Highgarden for a visit. Now that peace has come and all is right with the world, it would do you good to see some of it. You must excuse me. It's time I ate some of this food I paid for.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Help the poor boy.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Idiots, help your king.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: More than you were with Renly. Less than you would have been if Joffrey had done you the courtesy of consummating the marriage before dying. In any case, this would not be an opportune moment to press the issue.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The world is overflowing with horrible things. But they're all a tray of cakes next to death. They brought me your grandfather's body when he died, you know? Made me look at it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: They took me to the Great Hall and there he was. The man I'd married and suffered to father my children. A great doughy lump I'd sat next to at endless dinners and tedious gatherings. There he was... lying on a table.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Nonsense. Your circumstances have improved markedly. You may not have enjoyed watching him die, but you enjoyed it more than you would have enjoyed being married to him, I can promise you that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us. You did wonderful work on Joffrey. The next one should be easier.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The time has come, my dear. There's nothing more tedious than a trial. Except perhaps these gardens. If I have to take one more leisurely stroll through these gardens, I'll fling myself from the cliffs.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Have you been to see Tommen yet?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I wasn't originally meant to marry your grandfather Luthor, you know. He was engaged to my sister, your great-aunt Viola. I was to be given to some Targaryen or other. Marrying a Targaryen was all the rage back then. But the momentI saw my intended, with his twitchy little ferret's face and ludicrous silver hair, I knew he wouldn't do. So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How absentminded of me.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The following morning, Luthor never made it down the stairs to propose to my sister 'cause the boy couldn't bloody walk.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And once he could, the only thing he wanted was what I'd given him the night before. I was good. I was very, very good. You are even better. But you need to act quickly. Cersei may be vicious, but she's not stupid. She'll turn the boy against you as soon as she can. And by the time you're married, it'll be too late. Luckily for you ,the Queen Regent is rather distracted at the moment, mourning her dear departed boy. Accusing her brother of his murder, which he didn't commit.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He could have done,but he didn't.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: But I do know. You don't think I'd let you marry that beast, do you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Shh. Don't you worry yourself about all that. You just do what needs to be done.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh! You can smell the shit from 5 miles away. Well, why are we stopped, go on.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Rumors and gossip, that's all they got. It's theater, nothing more. If they arrested all the pillow biters in King's Landing there'd be no room left in the dungeons for anyone else.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Renly Baratheon shagged half the stable boys in the Seven Kingdoms. Everyone knew. No one cared.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And Loras is the queen's brother. No, no, no, no, this is unacceptable.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Of course she is. She wants to drag our names through the dirt. Put us in our place. Get some rest, dear, you look appalling. Let me deal with Cersei Lannister.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Your Grace, I have travelled a long way.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Put the pen down, dear, we all know you aren't writing anything.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And the famous tart Queen Cersei.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I know you're behind this absurd incarceration of my grandson.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You'll get your apology when I get Loras.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do you expect the alliance to continue after you've thrown our future into prison?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What veil?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I didn't trust your father. I didn't particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Well I think that's quite enough of that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What are you doing? Let us pass.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You there! Where would I find the High Septon, or High Sparrow, or whatever bloody fool name he's got.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You should have the decency to stand when you talk to a lady.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Don't spar with me little fellow.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Hips.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: A man of the people, is that your game? It's an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei's dirty work for her.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'm here for my grandson and granddaughter.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Don't you walk away from me.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What is it you want? Gold? I'll make you the richest septon who ever lived.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What then?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How do they communicate their demands? By raven or horse?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I've read the seven pointed star.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: If it's equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I'll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No you're not.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Not for your clientele, clearly.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You've always been rather impressed with yourself, haven't you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Don't pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you'd return to the capital once things started going wrong.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they'll never even find what's left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what did she want?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What kind of gift?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He's beaten us. That's what's happening.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh, this is madness!

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What have they done to you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: We marched for you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Have you lost your mind?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: As a mindless fanatic.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I will never leave you. Never.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'll see you soon, my dear.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That is hardly your concern.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Good.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met. At a certain age, it's hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I'll never forget it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'm leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you're half as bright as you think you are, you'll find your way out of here, too.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What'll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother's gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You're going to kill them all by yourself? You've lost, Cersei. It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What is your name again? Barbaro?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do shut up, dear.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Anything from you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what is my heart's desire?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It's done?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: So you'll just let them take it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Yes. You must be very wise by now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How will it happen?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Will there be pain?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That's good.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.
